views.title: joe mama made a springboard customizer

views.markdown:
#### System-wide Features
* Hide Status Bar
#### Home Screen Features
* Hide Dock Background
* Hide Folder Background
* Hide Folder Icon Background
* Hide Page Dots
* Hide Icon Labels
* Hide Testflight Dot
* Hide Notification Badges
* Disable App Library
* Hide App Library Blur
* Hide Folder Title
* Disable Icon Fly
* Set Number of Dock Icons
#### Lock Screen Features
* Hide Quick Actions
* Hide Lock Icon (Notched Only)
* Hide Date
* Use Compact Date Format
* Hide "No Older Notifications"
